column1: echo ¦{¦ echo '#!/bin/sh';  echo 'sh /elasticsearch/bin/elasticsearch &';  echo 'sleep 30';  echo 'sh /kibana/bin/kibana'; } > /startup.sh && chmod +x /startup.sh :: Filesystem_operation
